trips.notes: Aria Hotel confirmation: 9CBMG6TO. OOO block Mar 9-13 before trip.

restaurants.name: Jean-Georges Steakhouse
restaurants.note: Inside Aria. World-class steakhouse by Jean-Georges Vongerichten. Sexy dark ambiance, incredible dry-aged cuts.

restaurants.name: Carbone
restaurants.note: Inside Aria. NYC's legendary Italian import. Spicy rigatoni vodka and veal parm are iconic. Book early.

restaurants.name: CATCH
restaurants.note: Inside Aria. Stunning multi-level space. Truffle sashimi and sushi are standouts. Great scene.

restaurants.name: Bardot Brasserie
restaurants.note: Inside Aria by Michael Mina. Classic French brasserie ‚Äî steak frites, duck confit, raw bar.

restaurants.name: Toca Madera
restaurants.note: At Aria (around corner from check-in). Best Caesar salad in Vegas, outstanding NY strip. Fun atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Javier's
restaurants.note: Inside Aria. Elevated Mexican ‚Äî tableside guac, mole enchiladas, great tequila selection.

restaurants.name: Mastro's Ocean Club
restaurants.note: At Crystals (steps from Aria). World-class seafood tower, butter cake dessert is legendary. Live entertainment.

restaurants.name: Scarpetta
restaurants.note: Inside Cosmopolitan (5 min walk). Famous spaghetti tomato & basil. Elegant but not stuffy.

restaurants.name: Momofuku
restaurants.note: Inside Cosmopolitan. David Chang's Vegas outpost. Bo ss√§m, buns, and fried chicken in a casual setting.

restaurants.name: Proper Eats Food Hall
restaurants.note: Inside Aria. Quick quality bites ‚Äî Wexler's Deli, Temaki Bar sushi, Pizzaoki. Perfect for fast conference meals.

activities.name: Aria Spa & Salon
activities.description: 80,000 sq ft luxury spa inside Aria. Japanese-inspired wet areas, salt room, Ganbanyoku heated stone beds. Perfect conference recovery.

activities.name: O by Cirque du Soleil
activities.description: Aquatic masterpiece at Bellagio. Running nightly ‚Äî one of the best shows in Vegas. Book tickets in advance.

activities.name: Myst√®re by Cirque du Soleil
activities.description: Classic Cirque show at Treasure Island. Acrobatics, comedy, music. Great if you haven't seen Cirque before.

activities.name: David Copperfield
activities.description: Legendary magic show at MGM Grand, performing most nights in March. Intimate theatre, mind-blowing illusions.

activities.name: Absinthe
activities.description: Edgy variety/acrobatics show in a tent at Caesars Palace. Raunchy humor, jaw-dropping stunts. Vegas must-see.

activities.name: Jewel Nightclub at Aria
activities.description: Aria's in-house nightclub. Intimate multi-level space with top DJs. Skip the line with hotel guest access.

activities.name: The Bellagio Fountains
activities.description: Free iconic water show right across from Aria. Shows every 15-30 min from 3pm. Best viewed at night.

localTips: Carbone and CATCH book up fast ‚Äî reserve now for your Tuesday night dinner
Aria connects to Crystals, Cosmopolitan, and Bellagio via indoor walkways ‚Äî no need to go outside
Proper Eats Food Hall is your best bet for quick bites between MRC conference sessions
Ask for Aria hotel guest discount at the spa ‚Äî sometimes 10-15% off midweek
Uber/Lyft pickup is on Level 2 of the parking garage ‚Äî skip the taxi line
March weather is perfect in Vegas ‚Äî 20¬∞C days, bring sunglasses for the pool deck

weather.conditions: Mid-March in Vegas is ideal ‚Äî sunny, warm days around 21¬∞C (70¬∞F), cool evenings around 9¬∞C (48¬∞F). Very low chance of rain. Perfect pool weather.

trips.notes: AI & Automation Summit ‚Äî highly relevant for Revaly + SolveWorks positioning.
